message.body: are you in the studio at all today?
No sorry
no probs, thanksss!
Are you loading kilns today by any chance?
tonight! probably at 7 or so.
Thanks
I should be there around 630 tonight and it will take me all of 10 minutes to glaze the base of my tree trunk piece...will you wait for meeee, please??!!!
absolutely! i probably won't start until 7.
Yaaaayyy, thanks!
so i started kilns 2 & 4 on bisque and whichever of us gets there first in the morning can put the first peep in. have a fun night!
If I'm looking at the kilns which ones are 2 and 4?
the little one by the door and the round one next to the oval. they have numbers on them, technically.
Ok cool, ill let you know if ill be there in time to put it in
thanks!
My night defffinitely didn't end the way I planned so I won't be able to put the peep in, sorry.
oh man, i hope everything's okay! i'll take care of the kilns, no worries. :)
I'm at the studio for the next two hours if you need me to do anything
can you look at the big oval kiln and tell me what the display says?
It's switching between 16.56 and 254 and CPLF (or something like that)
oh, awesome. could you take the peeps out of that one and, if it hits under 200 while you're still there, can you put the lid up? (if you can't do it yourself i understand, haha)
Yeah, take all the prepared and and do the lid at the same time?
like, do the peeps now and then later go back and check the temp (where it said 254) and if it's under 200, do the lid.
Ok cool
thank you so much! you're seriously the best!
Np!
It was only at 226 and I'm about to leave
go ahead and open the lid if you can!
Ah sorry I already left
no problem! thanks anyway!
